chart_description: The 'postgres.transactions_duration' chart displays the observed time it takes to complete transactions in Postgres. This chart is useful for monitoring the performance of the database.

dimension_descriptions.100ms: This dimension represents the number of transactions that completed within 100 milliseconds. A high value indicates that the majority of transactions are executing quickly.
dimension_descriptions.500ms: This dimension represents the number of transactions that completed between 100 and 500 milliseconds. A high value in this dimension may indicate that some transactions are taking longer than expected but are still completing within a reasonable amount of time.
